newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-RBA's Fraser says economy could grow faster.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-RBA's Fraser says economy could grow faster.

text.p: Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) Governor Bernie Fraser said on Thursday that the Australian economy could probably grow faster given the spare capacity in the industrial sector and in the labour market.
"Can we go faster? We probably can given the spare capacity in plants and in the labour market," Fraser told a parliamentary committee.
"It's a matter of being able to grow at a rate that will hopefully use up that spare capacity without running into constraints (like) inflation and the current account deficit," Fraser said.
"They're the two traditional constraints that have caused growth to slow down in the past, they're not constraints at the moment," he said.
